name: Baby
wishText: I wish that you achieve every goal you set for yourself.
textInChatBox: I apologize since I can't come personally
text2: I'm glad that this is the 2nd year
text3: that we're celebrating your birthday together
text4: And I hope we can continue to do so,
text5Entry: I don't have a gift prepped for now
text5Content: but I figured I'll do what I do best
outroText: I'll come to u when I can!
replayText: click me if u wanna replay
